item.title: On Learning New Things
item.description:
Most new skills I've tried to learn seem to follow a similar trajectory:

  • Stage One - Beginner's Thrill: A rapid growth and learning pace at the beginning, because I'm conquering a lot of small goals, diving into something new and there are rapid gains which feels great.
  • Stage Two - Amateur's Reality â€¦
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer

item.title: Start Before You Are Ready
item.description: Found this article today via The Do Lectures and think it's so true - whatever you want to do, just start. Because "Sucking is the first step to being sorta good at something."
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer
